messages:
Name: Leroy Sané
Nationality: Germany
Date of Birth: January 11, 1996
Position: Attacker
Current club: Bayern München
Bundesliga clubs played for: Schalke 04, Bayern München

Bayern München attacker Leroy Sané has appeared in the vast majority of the side's Bundesliga matches in 2024/2025, making 30 appearances overall and accumulating 1,634 minutes of playing time. He has started in 17 of these appearances across their 34 fixtures and entered as a substitute on 13 occasions.

The last Bundesliga match that Sané played came on May 17 for Bayern München against Hoffenheim; a meeting that he played 29 minutes in during a 4-0 win. The attacker has netted 11 Bundesliga goals this campaign. He has been shown a yellow card twice.

Sané was last on target in the league in the 3-3 draw against RB Leipzig on May 3, netting in the 83rd minute. He opened his account for the campaign against Bochum on October 27, scoring during a 5-0 victory.
In last season's Bundesliga, Sané played in 27 games for Bayern München, scored eight goals and provided 11 assists.
Sané joined Bayern München in July 2020 from Manchester City, for whom he made 90 league appearances in total, scoring 25 goals and providing 28 assists.

It was on April 20, 2014 that Sané made his Bundesliga debut during his spell at Schalke 04, at the age of 18 years and 99 days, against Stuttgart. He scored on his Bundesliga debut for current side Bayern München versus Schalke 04 on September 18, 2020.

So far in his Bundesliga career, he has appeared in 200 matches in the competition, with 51 goals scored and 45 assists. Sané is yet to be shown a red card in the competition, despite making 200 appearances to date, with 20 yellow cards collected overall.
